name: Anandh Kumar
title: Software Engineer
summary: 4 years of Experience in software engineer with a passion for building innovative solutions.

experience.description: Developed and maintained software solutions for clients. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality projects within deadlines.
Freshere in the development and testing of Mobile Application. Gained hands-on experience in Android application developement on Native Android Studio.

projects.title: SPOTBAY
projects.description: SPOTBAY is a Gamification Web and Mobile application for Customer Engagement using Spring Reactive.

Support team with microservices and configuration using Spring Reactive and Spring Cloud.

projects.title: STOMAD
projects.description: Stock Management and Administration is a real-time inventory management system and analytics for Oman Client.
highlights: Worked on Front-End Design and Development with D3 Charts.
Support on API calls using Spring Boot.

projects.title: ZAMBART
projects.description: ZAMBART(BPM) is a Business Process Management using Spring Activiti which is for Zambia Client.

projects.title: SmartCity LEIP
